projects.title: Bright burn
projects.description: A 2D action fighting game built with unity
details: Developed a 2D action fighting game using Unity, focusing on character movement, combat mechanics, and level design.
Implemented player controls, enemy AI, and health systems to create an engaging gameplay experience.
Designed and balanced levels to provide a challenging yet enjoyable experience for players.
